item.description:
Ease your mind
Calm your body
Increase your creativity
And sense of well being

Use this opportunity to practice most common relaxation exercises in a warm, supportive group atmosphere.


This week's topic: Mindfulness.
Mindfulness teaches us to pay attention to the present moment in an open and non judgmental way. It not only helps us to relax, but also to live in a more conscious and creative way. We will practice mindful awareness exercises to bring about the feeling of calm and alertness.
item.name: Stress Reduction and Relaxation: Mindfulness
